original_title: Making Theater: Rashomon: A Play Is Born
overview: This 1998 documentary goes behind the scenes to chronicle the monumental efforts required to stage a major play. Filmmaker Anthony Azzopardi follows venerated director Neil Munro as he helms an ambitious theater production of the immortal Japanese tale "Rashomon." Munro helps his talented cast immerse themselves in the psychological crime drama, providing a fascinating look at the actors' process of inhabiting their characters.
title: Making Theater: Rashomon: A Play Is Born
